ANALISIS : 'Mengubur' Perppu UU KPK, Membidik (Peluang) Ahok
03 Nov 2019, 11:45 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


ANALISIS : 'Mengubur' Perppu UU KPK, Membidik (Peluang) Ahok

KBRN, Jakarta : Polemik tuntutan agar Pemerintah mengeluarkan Peraturan Pemerintah Pengganti Undang Undang (Perppu) Undang Undang Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (UU KPK) masih bergulir. Akan tetapi sejalan dengan itu, Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) terus maju dan bakal menunjuk langsung Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK). Dengan kata lain, pembentukan Dewas KPK nantinya tidak melewati mekanisme Panitia Seleksi (Pansel).Pelantikannya pun nanti akan dilakukan bersamaan dengan para Pimpinan KPK periode 2019-2023 yang sudah disahkan DPR RI beberapa waktu lalu."Tidak lewat pansel," sebut Jokowi kepada wartawan di Istana Merdeka Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Saat ini Presiden masih menggodok nama-nama yang bakal dipilihnya untuk duduk sebagai Dewas KPK. Selain nama-nama pilihannya, Kepala Negara mengaku dirinya juga sudah menerima masukan beberapa nama, yang sudah masuk daftar pertimbangannya.Agar tidak ada kesalahpahaman, perlu diketahui berdasarkan Undang Undang (UU) Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 tentang KPK mengatur ketua dan anggota dewan pengawas dipilih Presiden melalui panitia seleksi. Akan tetapi dalam Pasal 69 A ayat (1) mengatur ketua dan dewan pengawas untuk pertama kalinya ditunjuk dan diangkat oleh Presiden RI.Presiden meminta seluruh masyarakat percaya serta yakin dengan siapa yang nantinya terpilih. Karena nama-nama yang muncul nantinya adalah mereka dengan kredibilitas tak diragukan lagi dalam pemberantasan korupsi."Percayalah yang terpilih nanti adalah beliau-beliau yang memiliki kredibilitas baik," demikian Jokowi meyakinkan.Dewan Pengawas KPK merupakan amanat dalam Undang-Undang Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 tentang KPK. Dewan Pengawas nantinya berisi lima anggota, dengan seseorang merangkap sebagai ketua.Ketentuan tentang anggota dewan pengawas, terkait tugas, siapa yang bisa menjabat, hingga tata cara pemilihan tertuang dalam Pasal 37A sampai 37G. Dewan pengawas ini juga menggantikan keberadaan penasihat KPK.Salah satu tugas dewan pengawas yang mendapat sorotan adalah soal pemberian izin melakukan penyadapan, penggeledahan, dan penyitaan. Itu tertuang di Pasal 37 B ayat (1) huruf b.Tugas lain dewan pengawas yang tertuang dalam draf perubahan, antara lain mengawasi kerja KPK, menetapkan kode etik, evaluasi tugas pimpinan dan anggota KPK setahun sekali, hingga menyerahkan laporan evaluasi kepada presiden dan DPR.Pada bagian lain, berkembang dinamika menarik di media sosial, dimana nama Basuki Tjahaja Purnama atau karib disapa Ahok mendadak mengemuka diusulkan sebagai calon pimpinan Dewas KPK.Sekitar 14 jam yang lalu, netizen bernama Rudi Valinka melalui akun Twitter pribadinya, @kurawa, menulis; 'Kalo kalian setuju Ahok @basuki_btp kita ajukan menjadi salah satu calon anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK RI maka silahkan Rituit. Tantangan 10.000 rituit bisa tercapai gak? Supaya twit ini sampai ke tangan pak @jokowi' demikian tulis Rudi, yang hingga pukul 03.25 WIB sudah memperoleh 250 komentar, 13 ribu retweet, dan 3.960 like, seperti dilihat RRI, Minggu (3/11/2019).Kenapa sampai mengemuka nama mantan Gubernur DKI Jakarta Basuki Tjahaja Purnama? Apakah pria yang luas disapa Ahok itu memang memiliki kapasitas jika memang benar nantinya masuk bursa calon Dewan Pengawas KPK?Sepak Terjang AhokZhong Wanxue atau Basuki Tjahaja Purnama, yang karib disapa Ahok, awalnya duduk sebagai Wakil Gubernur DKI Jakarta mendampingi Gubernur Joko Widodo (Jokowi) untuk periode 2014-2017.Dua tahun mendampingi Jokowi yang diusung Partai Demokrasi Indonesia (PDI) Perjuangan dalam Pilpres 2014, warisan tampuk pimpinan Ibu Kota diterimanya dari Jokowi yang terpilih menjadi Presiden Indonesia, pada 14 November 2014.Pada 19 November 2014, Ahok resmi dilantik sebagai Gubernur DKI Jakarta oleh Presiden Joko Widodo di Istana Negara, Gambir, Jakarta Pusat. Jabatan itu diterimanya setelah sukses menjabat sebagai Pelaksana Tugas (Plt) Gubernur DKI Jakarta sejak 16 Oktober hingga 19 November 2014. Tak berapa lama kemudian, Djarot Syaiful Hidayat dari PDI Perjuangan naik mengisi Wakil Gubernur DKI Jakarta mendampingi Ahok.Selama memimpin Jakarta, banyak sepak terjang Ahok yang membuatnya dicintai warga sekaligus dibenci lawan-lawan politiknya.1. Bersama Jokowi Menggagas e-Budgeting Untuk Pemprov DKI JakartaSistem e-Budgeting mulai digagas 2013. Namun penerapannya dimulai untuk penyusunan APBD 2014. Aturannya tercantum dalam Peraturan Gubernur Nomor 145 Tahun 2013 tentang Penyusunan RAPBD/ APBDP melalui Electronic Budgeting. Pergub ditandatangani oleh Joko Widodo (Jokowi) pada saat menjabat sebagai Gubernur DKI Jakarta.Sistem e-Budgeting ini sendiri diadopsi dari sistem yang juga dipakai oleh Pemerintah Kota (Pemkot) Surabaya. Salah satu maksud dari adanya sistem ini adalah demi mencegah munculnya anggaran 'siluman' atau anggaran 'aneh' yang sengaja menjadi akal-akalan oknum tertentu.Mulai dari Musyawaran Perencanaan Pembangunan (Musrembang) hingga nantinya anggaran disahkan, semuanya akan disajikan secara transparan. Jadi tidak ada orang bisa ganti-ganti (program) berikut anggarannya.Sistem e-budgeting panen prestasi ketika diterapkan oleh Gubernur DKI Jakarta Basuki Tjahaja Purnama atau karib disapa Ahok. Pada 2016, sistem ini mendapatkan penghargaan dari Bappenas.Setidaknya, DKI Jakarta memperoleh tiga penghargaan sekaligus, yakni Terbaik I Kategori Provinsi dengan Perencanaan Terbaik, Terbaik I Kategori Provinsi dengan Perencanaan Inovatif, Terbaik I Kategori Provinsi dengan Perencanaan Progresif.2. Penertiban Kawasan Perjudian, Narkoba, dan Prostitusi KalijodoSiapa yang tak kenal tempat yang satu ini di wilayah Jakarta Utara. Kalijodo adalah area yang terkenal sebagai tempat prostitusi, penjualan alkohol, hiburan malam, dan perjudian. Pada 29 Februari 2016, area Kalijodo ditertibkan dengan alasan melanggar jalur hijau.Penertiban ini awalnya berjalan lancar dan penduduk bersedia dipindah ke rusunawa atau dipulangkan, namun terjadi perlawanan secara hukum oleh penguasa daerah setempat, Daeng Azis, dan beberapa anggota masyarakat hingga Lembaga Swadaya Masyarakat (LSM) yang beraliansi dengan lawan-lawan politik Ahok. Akhirnya, Daeng Aziz menjadi tersangka dugaan prostitusi dan Kalijodo menjadi taman bermain sekaligus kawasan kuliner bagi masyarakat Jakarta hingga saat ini. 3. Sengketa APBD 2015 dengan DPRD DKI JakartaPada 2015, pemerintahan Ahok terlibat sengketa dengan DPRD DKI Jakarta berkaitan dengan penetapan APBD 2015. Akibatnya, hingga Februari 2015, APBD DKI Jakarta belum ditetapkan dan APBD DKI 2015 gagal disahkan meskipun mediasi telah dilakukan oleh Kementerian Dalam Negeri. BACA JUGA: Kehadiran Dewan Pengawas Akan Menggantikan Penasihat KPK
Ketegangan berlanjut antara Ahok dengan para Anggota DPRD setelah ia membongkar praktik dana 'siluman' yang berusaha dimasukkan oknum ke dalam RAPBD DKI. Bahkan hingga Ahok sudah berpasangan dengan Djarot Syaiful Hidayat, mereka tetap bersitegang dengan DPRD DKI perihal anggaran-anggaran aneh yang coba disusupkan. Ahok menolak semua itu, dan memilih memperketat anggaran pengeluarannya. Dia memilih membangun banyak sekali Rusunawa untuk masyarakat Jakarta ketimbang mengikuti oknum-oknum yang mengusulkan dana-dana pembelian barang tidak wajar ke dalam anggaran DKI Jakarta.Tercatat banyak sekali politisi dari partai politik tertentu harus berurusan dengan Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK), bahkan sampai dipidanakan lalu masuk penjara berstatus koruptor saat Ahok membongkar praktik anggaran 'siluman' itu.4. Menetralisir Warga yang Tidak Wajar dalam Mencairkan KJPPada 10 Desember 2015, seusai mengikuti rapat Badan Anggaran, seorang ibu bersama rekannya melaporkan masalah yang dihadapinya dalam menggunakan KJP. Awalnya kasus yang dilaporkan yakni dipersulit dan dimintai biaya tambahan dalam menggesek KJP untuk keperluan anaknya.Merasa tidak yakin, Ahok kemudian meminta bukti-bukti pembayaran dan menemukan bahwa Yusri menggunakan KJP anaknya untuk menarik tunai di toko sebelah. Dari perkara inilah, Ahok mengatakan "maling" kepada ibu tersebut, akibat tidak mempergunakan kartu KJP dengan semestinya. Hal itu dilakukannya di depan awak media, dan akhirnya berbuntut panjang hingga Ahok dilaporkan ke polisi lalu lawan-lawan politiknya kembali berusaha mendongkel posisinya sebagai Gubernur DKI Jakarta kala itu.5. Membawa Banyak Perubahan di JakartaSelama memimpin Jakarta, Ahok dikenal sebagai sosok pembawa perubahan. Ia rutin mengunggah rekaman rapat-rapat pemerintah ke Youtube demi menjaga transparansi dan akuntabilitas.Berbagai gebrakan Ahok di Jakarta juga tak pernah lepas disorot media nasional, mulai dari mendisiplinkan kinerja aparat negara, mengganti armada bus Transjakarta, membersihkan pungutan liar di lingkungan Pemda, membersihkan sungai dari sampah, hingga menertibkan sejumlah kawasan kumuh dan membangun rumah susun di Jakarta.Berbagai kebijakan tata kota kerap melibatkan aksi penggusuran dan sering dianggap terlalu “galak”. Namun begitu, walaupun isu 'galak' dan 'tukang gusur' selalu disematkan lawan-lawan politiknya, Ahok tetap mendapat tempat di hati warga Jakarta.Menurut survei Charta Politika 2016, mayoritas warga Jakarta yakin Ahok tidak terlibat dalam sejumlah kasus korupsi yang sempat melibatkan Pemprov dan DPRD DKI Jakarta. Survey Poltracking Indonesia juga pernah menyebutkan bahwa 82 persen responden warga Jakarta menilai Ahok memiliki karakter tegas dan berwibawa.Artinya Ahok membawa gaya berbeda, dimana keterbukaan adalah tuntutan wajib bagi pekabat publik, transparansi penyusunan anggaran harus diketahui serta dinilai langsung masyarakat sejak awal penyusunannya, lantas gaya hidup serta perilaku korup maupun pungli yang harus dihilangkan dari Pemprov DKI Jakarta.Menakar Peluang Ahok Masuk Dewan Pengawas KPKPresiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menuturkan, dirinya masih mengumpulkan masukan terkait siapa saja yang dapat mengisi posisi di Dewan Pengawas (Dewan Pengawas) Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK). Selain itu, Kepala Negara juga menghargai proses hukum uji materi Undang-Undang KPK yang tengah berjalan di Mahkamah Konstitusi (MK).Pembentukan Dewas KPK sudah dalam proses penjaringan personel. Bahkan untuk pertama kalinya, pengangkatan anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK tidak melalui mekanisme panitia seleksi. Meski demikian, Kepala Negara meyakini bahwa para tokoh yang dipilih nantinya merupakan para tokoh yang memiliki kredibilitas baik. Hal itu diutarakan Presiden Jokowi dalam acara bincang santai dengan wartawan di Meja Oval Istana Merdeka pada Jumat petang. "Masih dalam proses mendapatkan masukan siapa yang bisa duduk di situ. Pelantikannya akan bersamaan dengan pengambilan sumpah Komisioner KPK, Desember 2019. Untuk pertama kalinya, tidak pakai Pansel, tapi percaya lah, yang terpilih ini mereka yang punya kredibilitas terbaik," jelas Presiden di Istana Merdeka, Jumat (01/11/2019). Selain itu, terkait banyaknya permintaan agar dikeluarkannya Perppu UU KPK, Presiden menyebutkan bahwa dirinya menghargai proses hukum uji materi Undang-Undang KPK yang tengah berjalan di Mahkamah Konstitusi. Menurutnya, ada sopan santun dalam ketatanegaraan yang tidak boleh dipandang sebelah mata. "Masih ada proses uji materi di MK. Kami hargai itu. Jangan langsung ditimpa dengan Perppu. Ada sopan santun dalam ketatanegaraan. Hargai itu," tegas Presiden. Dan mencuatnya nama Ahok di media sosial sepertinya menjadi satu hal yang bisa menjadi bargaining atau posisi tawar kepada siapapun yang menolak UU KPK hasil revisi hingga mendesak dikeluarkannya Perppu atas undang-undang tersebut.Salah satu tugas dewan pengawas yang mendapat sorotan adalah soal pemberian izin melakukan penyadapan, penggeledahan, dan penyitaan. Itu tertuang di Pasal 37 B ayat (1) huruf b. Tugas lain dewan pengawas yang tertuang dalam draf perubahan antara lain mengawasi kerja KPK, menetapkan kode etik, evaluasi tugas pimpinan dan anggota KPK setahun sekali, hingga menyerahkan laporan evaluasi kepada presiden dan DPR.Bisa dibayangkan jika ada Ahok di dalam, pasti semua orang langsung bisa menebak apa sebenarnya yang akan terjadi nanti. Akan tetapi ini masih sebatas dinamika, karena semua nama calon Anggota Dewas KPK ada di saku Presiden Jokowi. Untuk peluang? Boleh dikatakan terbuka lebar dan sudah ada tanda-tanda Ahok bakal kembali mengemban tugas tertentu. Dewan Pengawas KPK bisa masuk bidikan.

ANALYSIS: 'Bury' the Perppu on the KPK Law, Aiming (Opportunities) Ahok
03 Nov 2019, 11:45 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


ANALYSIS: 'Bury' the Perppu on the KPK Law, Aiming (Opportunities) Ahok

KBRN, Jakarta: Polemic demands that the Government issue Government Regulations in lieu of Law (Perppu) of the Corruption Eradication Commission Act (KPK Law) is still rolling. But in line with that, President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) continues to advance and will directly appoint the Board of Trustees (Dewas) of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK). In other words, the formation of the Dewas KPK will not pass the mechanism of the Selection Committee (Pansel). His inauguration will also be carried out in conjunction with the KPK Leaders in the 2019-2023 period which has been ratified by the House of Representatives some time ago. "Not through the pansel," Jokowi told reporters at the Merdeka Palace in Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). At present the President is still preparing the names he will choose to sit as the KPK's Board of Trustees. In addition to the names of his choice, the Head of State admitted that he had also received input from a number of names, which had been included in his consideration list. In order to have no misunderstanding, it is necessary to know based on Law (Act) No. 19 of 2019 concerning the KPK regulating the chair and members of the supervisory board elected by the President through the selection committee. However, in Article 69 A paragraph (1) regulates the chairman and board of supervisors for the first time appointed and appointed by the President of the Republic of Indonesia. The president asks all people to believe and be sure of who will be elected. Because the names that appear later are those with no doubt credibility in the eradication of corruption. "Believe that the chosen ones will be those who have good credibility," Jokowi assured. The KPK Supervisory Board is mandated in Law Number 19 Year 2019 about the KPK. The Supervisory Board will consist of five members, with one person concurrently the chairman. The provisions regarding the supervisory board members, related to their duties, who can serve, until the election procedures are stipulated in Articles 37A to 37G. This supervisory board also replaces the presence of the KPK advisors. One of the tasks of the supervisory board that gets the spotlight is the matter of granting permission to conduct wiretapping, search and seizure. It is stated in Article 37 B paragraph (1) letter b. Other supervisory board tasks contained in the draft amendment include supervising the work of the KPK, establishing a code of ethics, evaluating the duties of the leadership and members of the KPK once a year, to submitting an evaluation report to the president and the DPR In another part, interesting dynamics developed on social media, where the name Basuki Tjahaja Purnama or close friend called Ahok suddenly emerged as a candidate for leadership of Dewas KPK. About 14 hours ago, a netizen named Rudi Valinka through his personal Twitter account, @kurawa, wrote; 'If you agree Ahok @basuki_btp we propose to become one of the candidates for the Supervisory Board of the Republic of Indonesia KPK then please Rituit Can 10,000 challenges be achieved? So that this tweet reached the hands of Mr. @jokowi 'said Rudi, who until 03.25 WIB had received 250 comments, 13 thousand retweets, and 3,960 likes, as seen by RRI on Sunday (3/11/2019). DKI Jakarta Governor Basuki Tjahaja Purnama? Does the man who is broadly called Ahok really have the capacity if it is true that he will later enter the KPK Supervisory Board candidate? Lunge AhokZhong Wanxue or Basuki Tjahaja Purnama, who is intimately called Ahok, initially sat as the Deputy Governor of DKI Jakarta accompanying Governor Joko Widodo (Jokowi) to period 2014-2017. Two years accompanying Jokowi who was carried by the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDI) in the 2014 Presidential Election, the legacy of leadership for the Capital City was received from Jokowi who was elected President of Indonesia, on November 14, 2014. On November 19, 2014, Ahok was officially appointed as The Governor of DKI Jakarta by President Joko Widodo at the State Palace, Gambir, Central Jakarta. He received the position after successfully serving as Acting Governor of Jakarta from October 16 to November 19, 2014. Shortly afterwards, Djarot Syaiful Hidayat from PDI Perjuangan rose to fill the Deputy Governor of DKI Jakarta to accompany Ahok. During his lead in Jakarta, there were many actions. Ahok which made him loved by citizens at the same time hated by his political opponents. Together with Jokowi Initiating e-Budgeting for DKI Jakarta Provincial Government The e-budgeting system was initiated in 2013. However, its implementation began for the preparation of the 2014 APBD. The rules are listed in Governor Regulation No. 145 of 2013 concerning RAPBD / APBDP through Electronic Budgeting. The Governor's Decree was signed by Joko Widodo (Jokowi) while serving as the Governor of DKI Jakarta. The e-budgeting system itself was adopted from a system also used by the Surabaya City Government. One of the purposes of this system is to prevent the emergence of 'stealth' budgets or 'weird' budgets that are deliberately becoming a trick of certain elements. Starting from the Development Planning Conference (Musrembang) until later the budget is approved, everything will be presented transparently. So no one can change (program) and its budget. The harvesting e-budgeting system is an achievement when implemented by DKI Jakarta Governor Basuki Tjahaja Purnama or a close friend called Ahok. In 2016, this system received an award from Bappenas. At least, DKI Jakarta received three awards at once, namely the Best I Category of Provinces with the Best Planning, the Best I of the Category of Provinces with Innovative Planning, the Best I of the Category of Provinces with Progressive Planning.2. Control of Gambling, Drug and Kalijodo Prostitution Areas Who doesn't know this place in North Jakarta. Kalijodo is an area well known as a place for prostitution, alcohol sales, nightlife and gambling. On 29 February 2016, the Kalijodo area was disciplined on the grounds of violating the green lane. The order was initially running smoothly and residents were willing to be moved to low-cost flat or repatriated, but there was legal resistance by the local regional authority, Daeng Azis, and some members of the community up to the Non-Governmental Organization (NGOs) NGOs) allied with Ahok's political opponents. Finally, Daeng Aziz became a suspect of prostitution and Kalijodo became a playground as well as a culinary area for the people of Jakarta until now. 3. 2015 APBD dispute with DKI Jakarta DPRD In 2015, Ahok's government was involved in a dispute with DKI Jakarta DPRD related to the adoption of the 2015 APBD. As a result, as of February 2015, the DKI Jakarta APBD had not been established and the 2015 DKI APBD failed to be ratified despite mediation by the Ministry of Home Affairs . Tensions continued between Ahok and DPRD members after he dismantled the practice of 'stealth' funds that were trying to be included in the Jakarta RAPBD. Even until Ahok had partnered with Djarot Syaiful Hidayat, they remained in dispute with the DKI DPRD regarding strange budgets that were trying to be infiltrated. Ahok refused all that, and chose to tighten his spending budget. He chose to build a lot of Rusunawa for the people of Jakarta rather than follow elements who propose funds to purchase unnatural goods in the DKI Jakarta budget. Noted that a lot of politicians from certain political parties have to deal with the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK), even to be criminalized then go to prison with the status of a corrupt when Ahok dismantles the 'stealth' budget practice.4. Neutralizing Unreasonable Citizens in Disbursing KJP On December 10, 2015, after attending a Budget Agency meeting, a mother and her colleagues reported the problems they faced in using KJP. Initially the reported case was complicated and asked for additional costs in swiping KJP for the needs of his child. Feeling unsure, Ahok then asked for proof of payment and found that Yusri used his son's KJP to withdraw cash at the next store. From this case, Ahok said "thief" to the mother, due to not using the KJP card properly. This was done in front of the media crew, and finally had a long tail until Ahok was reported to the police and then his political opponents again tried to overthrow his position as Governor of DKI Jakarta at that time. Bringing Many Changes in Jakarta While leading Jakarta, Ahok was known as a figure of change. He routinely uploads recordings of government meetings to YouTube to maintain transparency and accountability. Ahok's breakthroughs in Jakarta have also never been highlighted by the national media, ranging from disciplining the performance of state officials, replacing the Transjakarta bus fleet, clearing illegal levies in the local government, cleaning up rivers from rubbish, to curbing a number of slums and building flats in Jakarta. Various urban planning policies often involve eviction and are often considered too "fierce". However, even though the issue of 'fierce' and 'evictors' is always pinned by political opponents, Ahok still has a place in the hearts of the citizens of Jakarta. According to the 2016 Charta Politika survey, the majority of Jakarta residents believe Ahok is not involved in a number of corruption cases that had involved the Provincial Government and DKI Jakarta DPRD. The Indonesian Poltracking Survey also mentioned that 82 percent of Jakarta residents considered Ahok to have a firm and authoritative character. This means that Ahok carries a different style, where openness is a mandatory requirement for public officials, transparency in budget preparation must be known and assessed directly by the community from the beginning of its preparation, then the style life and corrupt or extortion behavior that must be removed from the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government. Exploring Opportunities Ahok to Enter the KPK Presidential Supervisory Board Joko Widodo (Jokowi) said, he was still gathering input regarding whoeverg can fill a position on the Supervisory Board (Supervisory Board) of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK). In addition, the Head of State also appreciates the legal process of judicial review of the KPK Law which is currently underway at the Constitutional Court (MK). The establishment of the KPK Dewas is already in the process of selecting personnel. Even for the first time, the appointment of members of the KPK Supervisory Board did not go through the selection committee mechanism. However, the Head of State believes that the chosen figures will be the figures who have good credibility. This was stated by President Jokowi in a casual talk show with reporters at the Oval Table of the Merdeka Palace on Friday evening. "It is still in the process of getting input as to who can sit there. His inauguration will coincide with the taking of the oath of the Commissioner of the Corruption Eradication Commission, December 2019. For the first time, do not use Pansel, but believe, those chosen have the best credibility," explained the President in Merdeka Palace, Friday (01/11/2019). In addition, related to the many requests for the issuance of the KPPU Law Perppu, the President stated that he respected the legal process for judicial review of the KPK Law which was under way at the Constitutional Court. According to him, there are manners in the state administration that should not be underestimated. "There is still a material testing process at the Constitutional Court. We appreciate that. Do not overwrite it directly with the Perppu. There are manners in state administration. Appreciate that," said the President. And the emergence of Ahok's name on social media seems to be one thing that could be a bargaining or bargaining position for anyone who rejects the revised KPK Law to urge the issuance of the Perppu on the law. One of the tasks of the supervisory board that gets the spotlight is a matter of granting a wiretapping permit , search and seizure. It is stated in Article 37 B paragraph (1) letter b. Other duties of the supervisory board set forth in the draft amendment include overseeing the work of the KPK, establishing a code of ethics, evaluating the duties of the leadership and members of the KPK once a year, to submitting an evaluation report to the president and the DPR. It is conceivable if Ahok is present, surely everyone can immediately guess what exactly will happen later. However, this is still limited to dynamics, because all the names of candidates for KPK Dewas Members are in President Jokowi's pocket. For opportunities? It could be said to be wide open and there were already signs that Ahok would again carry out certain tasks. The KPK Supervisory Board can enter the shot.
